circular signed graph

Source: R/random_graphs.R
graph_circular_signed.Rd

circular graph with positive and negative edges.

Usage

graph_circular_signed(n, r = 1, pos = 0.1, neg = 0.1)

Arguments

n

number of nodes

r

radius

pos

distance fraction between positive edges

neg

distance fraction between negative edges

Value

igraph graph

Author

David Schoch

Examples

library(igraph)
graph_circular_signed(n = 50)
#> IGRAPH ab0d264 U--- 50 359 -- 
#> + attr: x (v/n), y (v/n), sign (e/n)
#> + edges from ab0d264:
#>   [1] 1-- 3 1-- 9 1--11 1--21 1--24 1--25 1--26 1--29 1--30 1--32 1--33 1--36
#>  [13] 1--37 1--39 1--45 2-- 4 2-- 5 2--10 2--24 2--27 2--41 2--43 2--44 2--45
#>  [25] 2--47 2--48 3-- 9 3--11 3--12 3--20 3--21 3--22 3--24 3--29 3--30 3--34
#>  [37] 3--36 3--37 3--39 3--43 3--45 4-- 5 4--10 4--24 4--34 4--41 4--43 4--44
#>  [49] 4--45 4--47 5-- 7 5--10 5--12 5--20 5--23 5--27 5--34 5--43 5--44 5--46
#>  [61] 5--47 5--48 5--50 6-- 8 6--13 6--14 6--15 6--16 6--18 6--22 6--28 6--31
#>  [73] 6--38 6--40 6--42 6--49 7-- 8 7--10 7--17 7--19 7--23 7--27 7--28 7--35
#>  [85] 7--38 7--41 7--46 7--47 7--48 7--50 8--13 8--14 8--15 8--16 8--17 8--18
#> + ... omitted several edges
